Song.title: He Is Wonderful
Song.copyright: Â© 2009 Integrity Worship Music (Admin. by Integrity Music, Inc.) Steve Cook | Vikki Cook For use solely with the SongSelect Terms of Use. All rights Reserved. www.ccli.com

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [B(no3) Bm2 E7 Bm2 E7]
Verse 1: All the angels s[Bm]tood trembling [Bm2]at this [E]wonder As the S[Gmaj9]on entered [D]Adam's world [A/C#] [F#m7]He the infi[Bm2]nite now an Infant [E/G#]laying In the a[G]rms [G] of o[Em]ne He made [F#sus F#] Who im[Em]agined on this [Bm]dark night That the L[Em]ight of light had come [F#sus F#]
Chorus 1: He is W[Gmaj7]onderful [G6] Alm[D]ighty One [D2] Salv[Bm7]ation's Prince[A] of Peace [Gmaj7] He is W[Gmaj7]onderful [G6] Our G[D]od with us [D2] the j[Bm7]oy of heav[A]en He[Em7] is J[F#m]esus [Bm2 E]
Verse 2: One day He'll rev[Bm]eal the myst'ry of God's w[E]isdom In His [G]plan to s[D]ave the lost [A] He the Lamb of G[Bm]od will change the course of h[E]ist'ry When He c[G]onquers s[Em7]in and d[F#sus F]eath But who im[Em]agined on this d[Bm]ark night That the L[Em7]ord of lords had come [F#sus F]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 all the angels stood trembling at this wonder as the son entered adams world he the infinite now an infant laying in the arms of one he made who imagined on this dark night that the light of light had come chorus 1 he is wonderful almighty one salvations prince of peace he is wonderful our god with us the joy of heaven he is jesus verse 2 one day hell reveal the mystry of gods wisdom in his plan to save the lost he the lamb of god will change the course of histry when he conquers sin and death but who imagined on this dark night that the lord of lords had come
